titles.title: To include the Territory of American Samoa in the program of aid to the aged, blind, or disabled.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Amends part A (General Provisions) of title XI of the Social Security Act to extend the benefits under titles I (Old Age Assistance), X (Aid to the Blind), XIV (Aid to Permanently and Totally Disabled), and XVI (Supplemental Security Income) to the residents of American Samoa.
